prompt: Create a dark-themed order tracking page with a sleek black background. Show order number '#ORD-2024-003' in white bold text at the top with a yellow 'Shipped' status chip. Include a horizontal progress stepper with 4 stages: Order Placed (completed, green), Processing (completed, green), Shipped (current, yellow), and Delivered (pending, gray). Display estimated delivery as 'March 18, 2024'. Add an order summary card with a product image placeholder, item name 'Bluetooth Speaker', quantity 'Qty: 1', and price '$59.99', styled with a dark gray background and white text. Include a delivery address section for 'Alice Brown', '789 Pine St, Seattle, WA 98101', and phone '+1 (555) 456-7890'. Add a carrier section with 'DHL' and tracking number 'DHL456789123'. Place two buttons at the bottom: a yellow 'Track Package' elevated button and a white 'Contact Support' outlined button. Use rounded corners, subtle neon glow effects, and generous padding for a modern aesthetic.
